game.name: SEARCH ALL - WORMS
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Is a Hidden Object game where you have to find all the worms in a large area. Worms will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a Hidden Object game where you have to find all the worms in a large area. Worms will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places
